column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jocelyn - Thank you very much for the great review. And first and foremost -- thank you for giving us a try! I'm glad we were able to provide you with top-notch service and food. We work hard to provide consistent fare
column2: so it's always reassuring to read such positive reviews. So thank you again
column3: and we look forward to another visit the next time you're in town!
